name: WEBFLOW__AUTHORIZATION_INFO
description: Get information about the current authorization token, including scopes and user details.

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_SITES
description: List all sites that the current access token can access. Returns site details including ID, workspace, display name, and custom domains.

name: WEBFLOW__SITE
description: Get detailed information about a specific site including its configuration, domains, and settings.

name: WEBFLOW__PUBLISH_SITE
description: Publish a site to make changes live. Publishes the site to the live domain.

site_id.description: Unique identifier for the site to publish

publishToWebflowSubdomain.description: Whether to publish to the Webflow subdomain

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_COLLECTIONS
description: List all CMS collections for a specific site. Returns collection metadata including fields and settings.

name: WEBFLOW__COLLECTION
description: Get detailed information about a specific CMS collection including its fields and configuration.

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_COLLECTION
description: Create a new CMS collection for a site with specified fields and settings.

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_COLLECTION_ITEMS
description: List all items in a CMS collection with support for filtering, sorting, and pagination.

offset.description: Number of items to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return

name: WEBFLOW__COLLECTION_ITEM
description: Get detailed information about a specific item in a CMS collection.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection item

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_COLLECTION_ITEMS
description: Create one or multiple new items in a CMS collection. Supports bulk creation of up to 100 items per request.

fieldData.description: Field data for the collection item

isDraft.description: Whether the item should be created as a draft

name: WEBFLOW__UPDATE_COLLECTION_ITEMS
description: Update one or multiple existing items in a CMS collection. Supports bulk updates of up to 100 items per request.

id.description: Unique identifier for the item to update

fieldData.description: Updated field data for the collection item

isDraft.description: Whether the item should be set as draft

name: WEBFLOW__COLLECTION_ITEMS
description: Delete one or multiple items from a CMS collection. Supports bulk deletion of up to 100 items per request.

itemIds.description: Array of item IDs to delete (max 100)

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_COLLECTION_FIELD
description: Create a new field in an existing CMS collection with specified type and settings.

isUnique.description: Whether this field must be unique

name: WEBFLOW__UPDATE_COLLECTION_FIELD
description: Update an existing field in a CMS collection, modifying its settings and properties.

displayName.description: Updated display name for the field

isUnique.description: Whether this field must be unique

name: WEBFLOW__COLLECTION_FIELD
description: Remove a field from a CMS collection permanently.

field_id.description: Unique identifier for the field to delete

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_FORMS
description: List all forms on a specific site, including form fields and settings.

name: WEBFLOW__FORM
description: Get detailed information about a specific form including its fields and configuration.

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_FORM_SUBMISSIONS
description: List form submissions for a specific form with pagination support.

offset.description: Number of submissions to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of submissions to return

name: WEBFLOW__FORM_SUBMISSION_GET_SUBMISSIONS
description: Get detailed information about a specific form submission.

submission_id.description: Unique identifier for the form submission

name: WEBFLOW__UPDATE_FORM_SUBMISSION
description: Update form submission status and other properties.

submission_id.description: Unique identifier for the form submission

name: WEBFLOW__FORM_SUBMISSION_DELETE_SUBMISSIONS
description: Delete a form submission permanently.

submission_id.description: Unique identifier for the form submission to delete

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_ASSETS
description: List all assets (images, documents, etc.) for a specific site with pagination support.

offset.description: Number of assets to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of assets to return

name: WEBFLOW__ASSET
description: Get detailed information about a specific asset including its metadata and URLs.

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_ASSET
description: Upload a new asset (image, document, etc.) to a Webflow site.

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_WEBHOOKS
description: List all webhooks configured for a specific site.

name: WEBFLOW__WEBHOOK_GET_WEBHOOKS
description: Get detailed information about a specific webhook including its configuration and events.

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a new webhook to receive notifications when specific events occur on a site.

url.description: URL to send webhook notifications to

triggerType.description: Type of event that triggers the webhook

filter.description: Optional filters to limit when webhook fires

name: WEBFLOW__WEBHOOK_DELETE_WEBHOOKS
description: Remove a webhook from a site permanently.

webhook_id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook to delete

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_PRODUCTS
description: List all ecommerce products for a specific site with pagination and filtering support.

offset.description: Number of products to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of products to return

name: WEBFLOW__PRODUCT
description: Get detailed information about a specific ecommerce product including variants and pricing.

name: WEBFLOW__CREATE_PRODUCT
description: Create a new ecommerce product with variants, pricing, and inventory information.

name: WEBFLOW__UPDATE_PRODUCT
description: Update an existing ecommerce product's information, pricing, or inventory.

name: WEBFLOW__LIST_ORDERS
description: List all ecommerce orders for a specific site with pagination and filtering options.

offset.description: Number of orders to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return

name: WEBFLOW__ORDER
description: Get detailed information about a specific ecommerce order including items and customer details.

name: WEBFLOW__UPDATE_ORDER
description: Update order fulfillment status and other order properties.
